item.title: Profile Bravo
item.description: body,html{ width:100%; height:100%; padding:0px; margin:0px; } .modal-dialog{ height:calc(100% - 60px); } .modal-content{ height:100%; } .modal-header{ height:50px; } .model-footer{ height:75px; } .modal-body { height:calc(100% - 125px); overflow-y: scroll; } Bravo × iframe, object, embed { max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%; } Youtube facebook Facebook photo_camera Instagram flutter_dash Twitter sports_esports sports_esports Close More Info Bravo Bio #1 Bravo SocMed Bravo Latest Video document.
